scripts.cpws: mkdir -p ./assets/socket.io && cp ./node_modules/socket.io-client/dist/socket.io.js ./assets/socket.io/socket.io.js &&  cp ./node_modules/socket.io-client/dist/socket.io.js.map ./assets/socket.io/socket.io.js.map && mkdir -p ./assets/sockjs && cp ./node_modules/sockjs-client/dist/sockjs.min.js ./assets/sockjs/sockjs.min.js &&  cp ./node_modules/sockjs-client/dist/sockjs.min.js.map ./assets/sockjs/sockjs.min.js.map &&  cp ./node_modules/websocket-multiplex/multiplex_client.js ./assets/sockjs/multiplex.js && mkdir -p ./assets/clusterws && cp ./node_modules/clusterws-client-js/browser/clusterws.min.js ./assets/clusterws/clusterws.js
